inputs.Inline:
$deployEnv = 'Dev'
$resGroupName = 'ptas-dev-resourcegroup'
$vaultName = "PTAS-$($deployEnv)-KeyVault"

function AssignRole()
{
	param( $principalName, $roleName, $resourceName, $resourceType, $resourceGroupName)

	write-output "-> Reading $principalName Service Principal"
	
	$servicePrincipal = Get-AzADServicePrincipal -SearchString $principalName

	write-output "-> Adding $roleName role for $resourceName ..."

	$currentRole = Get-AzRoleAssignment -ObjectId $servicePrincipal.Id -RoleDefinitionName $roleName -ResourceName $resourceName -ResourceType $resourceType -ResourceGroupName $resourceGroupName

	if ($currentRole -eq $null)
	{
	   New-AzRoleAssignment -ObjectId $servicePrincipal.Id -RoleDefinitionName $roleName -ResourceName $resourceName -ResourceType $resourceType -ResourceGroupName $resourceGroupName
	}
}

function AddVaultAccess()
{	
	param( $principalName, $keyvaultName )

	write-output "-> Reading $principalName Service Principal"
	
	$servicePrincipal = Get-AzADServicePrincipal -SearchString $principalName

	write-output "-> Adding KeyVault access policy for $principalName"
	
	Set-AzKeyVaultAccessPolicy -VaultName  $keyvaultName -ObjectId $servicePrincipal.Id -PermissionsToSecrets Get
}

function AddSqlServerAccess()
{
	#write-output "--> Adding datareader role for SQL Server..."
	#$readOnlyAdGroup = Get-AzADGroup -SearchString "Azure-PTAS-[Env]-DBReadOnly"
	#Add-AzADGroupMember -MemberObjectId  $servicePrincipal.Id -TargetGroupObjectId $readOnlyAdGroup.Id
}

# --- Map Tile Services role assignment ---
$servicePrincipalName = "PTAS-$($deployEnv)-MapTileServices"
AssignRole -principalName $servicePrincipalName -roleName "Storage Blob Data Contributor" -resourceName "ptas$($deployEnv.ToLower())storagepremium" -resourceType "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts" -resourceGroupName $resGroupName
AddVaultAccess -principalName $servicePrincipalName -keyvaultName $vaultName
AddSqlServerAccess

# --- Data Services role assignment ---
$servicePrincipalName = "PTAS-$($deployEnv)-DataServices"
AssignRole -principalName $servicePrincipalName -roleName "Storage Blob Data Contributor" -resourceName "ptas$($deployEnv.ToLower())storage" -resourceType "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts" -resourceGroupName $resGroupName
AddVaultAccess -principalName $servicePrincipalName -keyvaultName $vaultName

# --- Document Storage Services role assignment ---
$servicePrincipalName = "PTAS-$($deployEnv)-DocumentStorageServices"
AssignRole -principalName $servicePrincipalName -roleName "Storage Blob Data Contributor" -resourceName "ptas$($deployEnv.ToLower())storage" -resourceType "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts" -resourceGroupName $resGroupName
AssignRole -principalName $servicePrincipalName -roleName "Cognitive Services User" -resourceName "PTAS-$($deployEnv)-ComputerVision" -resourceType "Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts" -resourceGroupName $resGroupName
AddVaultAccess -principalName $servicePrincipalName -keyvaultName $vaultName

workflowTasks.name: Azure Function App Deploy: PTAS MapTileServices
Azure Function App Deploy: PTAS Media Info
Azure Web App Deploy: PTAS DataServices
Azure App Service Deploy: PTAS Document Services
